raw_comment:
Thought: I notice that wealthy applicants and also legacy applicants have a better probability of being admitted to one of the many prestigious institutions, In comparison to lower class applicants who are not legacy student.

Questions : I wonder If donation form legacy student parents affects the  students chance of being admission.

Possible Headlines: Can Money Buy Your Education
ace_sentences: I notice that wealthy applicants have a higher probability of admission to a prestigious institution.
I notice that legacy applicants have a higher probability of admission to a prestigious institution.
Some lower-class applicants are not legacy applicants.
Lower-class non-legacy applicants have a lower probability of admission to a prestigious institution.
I wonder whether a donation from a parent of a legacy applicant affects the chance of admission of the applicant.
The headline is: Can money buy your education?
